title: Ive forgoten my email and email password
body: I have recently said about abhacker and when I got on to log on it said I got suspended. So I tryed to log in to my outlook account and it said it was wrong. I havnt used that account in ages so of course I forgot it so can you give me a recovery link please riot

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416

Here it is! Let me know if you have any questions!
